original_text: David was very upset because his men were complaining. They wanted to kill him with stones. His men were very upset because they had lost their sons and their daughters. But David trusted the Lord his God to make him strong.
korean_text: 백성들이 자녀들 때문에 마음이 슬퍼서 다윗을 돌로 치자 하니 다윗이 크게 다급하였으나 그의 하나님 여호와를 힘입고 용기를 얻었더라

sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그의 부하들이 불평하고 있었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: They wanted to kill him with stones
because they had lost their sons and their daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 자신들의 아들들과 딸들을 잃었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: But David trusted the Lord his God
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다윗은 주 그의 하나님을 믿었습니다
